0.name: Apple iPhone 11
0.description: The iPhone 11 combines powerful performance and affordability with a bright 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD display and the fast A13 Bionic chip. Its dual-camera system delivers stunning photos and 4K video, while all-day battery life and durable design make it a reliable everyday smartphone for users seeking premium features at a reasonable price.
0.detailsDescription: Featuring Night mode for impressive low-light photography, Smart HDR, and Portrait mode with advanced bokeh effects. The device supports wireless charging, IP68 water and dust resistance, and Face ID for secure authentication. With stereo speakers and Dolby Atmos support, it offers an immersive audio experience alongside smooth multitasking capabilities.

1.name: Apple iPhone 13 mini
1.description: The iPhone 13 mini packs flagship-level power into a compact 5.4-inch body, featuring a vibrant Super Retina XDR OLED display and the lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip. Its advanced dual-camera system and improved battery life make it perfect for those who want premium performance in a pocket-friendly size.
1.detailsDescription: Cinematic mode records videos with shallow depth of field, while Photographic Styles let you personalize your shots. The ceramic shield front cover provides superior durability, and 5G connectivity ensures fast downloads. With HDR support, True Tone, and Wide color (P3), the display delivers exceptional brightness and color accuracy in any lighting.

2.name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
2.description: The iPhone 14 Pro introduces groundbreaking innovations like Dynamic Island and Always-On display on its 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR screen with ProMotion. Powered by the A16 Bionic chip, it offers unmatched speed and efficiency alongside a revolutionary 48MP triple-camera system for professional-grade photography and videography.
2.detailsDescription: The Photonic Engine dramatically improves low-light performance, while Action mode delivers ultra-stable video. Safety features include Crash Detection and Emergency SOS via satellite. With stainless steel design, Ceramic Shield protection, and IP68 rating, it combines premium build quality with cutting-edge technology for creators and power users.

3.name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max
3.description: The iPhone 14 Pro Max is the ultimate iPhone with its massive 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display featuring ProMotion and Always-On capability. The A16 Bionic chip delivers exceptional performance, while the longest battery life in the lineup and pro-level camera system make it ideal for demanding users.
3.detailsDescription: The 48MP main sensor with advanced computational photography captures incredible detail, supported by 3x optical zoom and Cinematic mode in 4K Dolby Vision. Dynamic Island transforms notifications into interactive experiences. Additional safety features like Crash Detection, premium stainless steel construction, and superior water resistance ensure reliability in any situation.

4.name: Apple iPhone 12
4.description: The iPhone 12 brings 5G connectivity and a sleek flat-edge design with a vibrant 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Powered by the A14 Bionic chip, it offers excellent performance for gaming and multitasking. The dual-camera system captures sharp photos and 4K Dolby Vision video, while Ceramic Shield provides superior durability.
4.detailsDescription: Featuring Night mode on both rear and front cameras, Smart HDR 3, and Deep Fusion for enhanced detail in every shot. With MagSafe wireless charging, IP68 water resistance, and iOS ecosystem integration, the iPhone 12 delivers premium features and all-day battery life in a compact, stylish package.

5.name: Apple iPhone 13
5.description: The iPhone 13 delivers flagship performance with a bright 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display and the powerful A15 Bionic chip. Its advanced dual-camera system with sensor-shift stabilization captures stunning photos and videos, while improved battery life keeps you going all day in a durable Ceramic Shield design.
5.detailsDescription: Cinematic mode adds shallow depth of field to videos, and Photographic Styles let you personalize your shots. With longer battery life than previous models, 5G support, and enhanced low-light performance through larger sensors, the iPhone 13 offers premium features at a balanced price point.

6.name: Apple iPhone 15
6.description: The iPhone 15 features the innovative Dynamic Island and a powerful 48MP main camera on its 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Powered by the A16 Bionic chip, it delivers smooth performance and efficiency. With USB-C connectivity and improved battery life, it's designed for modern everyday use.
6.detailsDescription: The advanced computational photography includes 2x optical-quality zoom and next-generation portraits with Focus and Depth Control. Emergency SOS via satellite and Crash Detection add safety features, while the durable aerospace-grade aluminum design and Ceramic Shield front ensure longevity and protection.

7.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
7.description: The iPhone 15 Pro introduces a titanium design and the powerful A17 Pro chip with a 6.1-inch ProMotion display. Its pro camera system with 48MP main sensor and advanced video capabilities sets new standards for mobile photography and content creation in a lightweight, durable frame.
7.detailsDescription: Featuring Action button for customizable shortcuts, USB-C with USB 3 speeds, and pro-level video recording including ProRes and Log. The triple-camera system offers 5x optical zoom on Pro Max model, while ray tracing-enabled graphics deliver console-quality gaming performance.

8.name: Apple iPhone SE 2022
8.description: The iPhone SE (2022) combines powerful A15 Bionic performance with a compact 4.7-inch design and Touch ID. It offers 5G connectivity, excellent camera capabilities with computational photography, and long software support in an affordable, classic iPhone form factor that fans love.
8.detailsDescription: Despite its small size, it delivers flagship-level performance with Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles, and Deep Fusion. The durable glass design with IP67 water resistance and wireless charging support make it a practical choice for users who prefer smaller phones with modern features.

9.name: Apple iPhone 12 mini
9.description: The iPhone 12 mini offers full flagship experience in the smallest form factor with a brilliant 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display and A14 Bionic chip. Its dual-camera system and 5G capability deliver premium performance while fitting comfortably in one hand.
9.detailsDescription: Featuring Night mode, Deep Fusion, and Smart HDR 3 for exceptional photography in a compact body. With MagSafe accessories, IP68 rating, and Ceramic Shield protection, it combines cutting-edge technology with the convenience of a truly pocketable iPhone design.

10.name: Apple iPhone 15 Plus
10.description: The iPhone 15 Plus features a large 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with Dynamic Island and exceptional battery life. Powered by the A16 Bionic chip and 48MP camera system, it offers premium features and all-day performance in a spacious, comfortable design.
10.detailsDescription: With USB-C charging, Emergency SOS via satellite, and Crash Detection safety features, plus advanced photography capabilities including 2x optical-quality zoom and next-generation portraits. The durable aluminum design and longest battery life in the standard lineup make it perfect for extended use.

11.name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
11.description: The iPhone 13 Pro introduced ProMotion 120Hz display and pro camera system with macro photography on a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR screen. Powered by A15 Bionic, it delivers exceptional performance, cinematic video capabilities, and all-day battery in a premium stainless steel design.
11.detailsDescription: Featuring triple-camera system with 3x optical zoom, LiDAR scanner for Night mode portraits, and ProRes video recording. The adaptive refresh rate saves battery while providing smooth scrolling, making it ideal for professionals and content creators seeking advanced features.
